title: MD
biography: Joel Francis Habener was an American endocrinologist who was professor of medicine at Harvard Medical School and an associate physician at the Massachusetts General Hospital.
aiSummary: Joel F. Habener is a glucagon gene discovery specialist with an H-index of 125 at Harvard Medical School (Faculty). Has been published in Nature Genetics, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Science. Based in United States.
